description: I took me 4.5 hours but I think normal people can do it in 3.5 hour. Not a very exciting trip. I saw horned lizard on the trail. That was the only highlight.
directions: on 67, heading to North Rim info center, turn right at Point Sublime Trl.It's better to go to the info center and ask for direction there... It's only a 10 minutes drive from the info center. There's a parking lot at the trail head
title: Grand Canyon North Rim - Widforss Trail
